name: Promised Land
description: Guide a team to their first-ever national championship. This scenario is for programs that have never won a national title and are waiting for a hero to lead them to the Promised Land.

name: Return to Glory
description: Take on the challenge of restoring a once-great program to its former glory. This scenario is for teams that have tasted championship success but have fallen on hard times and are currently rated as 3 stars or below.

name: End the Drought
description: Bring back the glory days for a team that has won a national championship, but hasn't tasted victory in the last 25 years. This scenario is perfect for those who want to end long-standing droughts and return to the top.

name: Sleeping Giants
description: Awaken a team that has a rich history but has been dormant for years. This scenario is for teams with at least two national championship but none in the last 50 years.

name: New Kids on the Block
description: Take on a team that is relatively new to Division 1 football. This scenario features teams that started playing D1 football since 2013.

name: Fill Big Shoes
description: Take over a powerhouse program and maintain its legacy. This scenario is for teams that are currently rated as 5 stars.

name: Underdog Story
description: Lead an underdog team to greatness. This scenario features teams that are currently rated as 1-star programs.

name: Long Time Coming
description: Lead a team that has been playing Division 1 football for over 100 years but has never won a national championship. It's time to make history!

name: Unranked to Unstoppable
description: Take an unranked team and turn them into a powerhouse. This scenario is for teams that are currently unranked in the preseason polls.

name: Keep it Going
description: Take a ranked team and keep the momentum going. This scenario is for teams that are currently ranked in the preseason polls.

name: Power 5 (4?) Only
description: Lead a prestigious Power 5 conference team to victory. This scenario is perfect for those who want to take charge of a team from one of the most competitive conferences, including Notre Dame and the Pac 12 (for now).

name: Group of 5 Only
description: Take on the challenge of coaching a team from the Group of 5 conferences. This scenario includes teams from the American, Conference USA, MAC, Mountain West, Sun Belt, UConn, and UMass.
